# Scripts

Bundled resources for clustering-algorithm-runner skill

- [x] run_kmeans.py: Executes K-means clustering with configurable parameters.
- [x] run_dbscan.py: Executes DBSCAN clustering with configurable parameters.
- [x] run_hierarchical.py: Executes hierarchical clustering with configurable parameters.
- [x] data_loader.py: Loads data from various formats (CSV, JSON) into a standardized format for clustering.
- [x] cluster_evaluator.py: Evaluates the performance of clustering algorithms using metrics like silhouette score and Davies-Bouldin index.
